#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int find_base(int n)
{
    int i, j, k, max = n % 10;
    while(n != 0) {
        k = n % 10;
        if(max <=  k) {
            max = k;
        }
        n = n / 10;
    }
    return(max + 1);
}

int base_10(int n)
{
    int i, j, k = 0, l;
    j = find_base(n);

    for(i = 0; n != 0; i++) {
        l = n % 10;
        k = k + (l * pow(j, i));
        n = n / 10;
    }
    return k;
}
int main()
{
    int n, i, a, b, j, k;

    cin >> n;
    //scanf("%d", &n);

    while(n--) {
        cin >> i >> j;
        //scanf("%d %d", &i, &j);
        k = base_10(i) + base_10(j);
        cout << k << endl;
       // printf("%d\n", k);
    }

    return 0;
}
